oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Skyline at night, Nashville, Tennessee, between 1930 and 1945
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of the Nashville city skyline at night circa 1930. The scene is possibly a view from the Woodland Street Bridge or Jefferson Street Bridge looking toward the Shelby Street Bridge. The state capitol is discernable in the distance. The Cumberland River is pictured in the foreground. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Capitol (Nashville, Tenn.)
